mapper.insert: insert into attraction_info(type_code, name, address, latitude, longitude, description, img, user_id) values(#{attractionType.typeCode}, #{name}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{description}, #{img.saveFile}, #{userId})
mapper.sql: select attraction_key, count(*) 'popular' from user_like_attraction group by attraction_key
mapper.select:
select * from attraction_info a join attraction_type b on a.type_code = b.type_code left outer join () c on a.attraction_key = c.attraction_key
order by (6371*acos(cos(radians(${latitude}))*cos(radians(latitude))*cos(radians(longitude) -radians(${longitude}))+sin(radians(${latitude}))*sin(radians(latitude)))) limit ${start}, ${countPerPage}
select * from attraction_info a join attraction_type b on a.type_code = b.type_code left outer join () c on a.attraction_key = c.attraction_key where a.attraction_key = #{attractionKey}
mapper.update: update attraction_info set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude=#{longitude}, description=#{description}, img=#{img.saveFile} where attraction_key=#{attractionKey}
mapper.delete: delete from user_like_attraction where user_id= #{userId} and attraction_key= #{attractionKey}
mapper.select: select a.*, c.* from attraction_info a join user_like_attraction b on a.attraction_key = b.attraction_key join attraction_type c on a.type_code = c.type_code where b.user_id = #{userId}
select count(1) from user_like_attraction where user_id = #{userId} and attraction_key=#{attractionKey}
select * from attraction_info a join () b on a.attraction_key = b.attraction_key order by b.popular desc limit ${n}

select * from attraction_info a join (select attraction_key, count(*) 'report' from user_report_attraction group by attraction_key) b on a.attraction_key = b.attraction_key where b.report >= ${n} order by b.report desc
